text: Umuhanaguzi mwene Mariyamu sicarico cose atari uko ari intumwa y’Imana gusa, ntankeka intumwa z’Imana nyinshi zararenganye imbere yiwe, n’umuvyeyi wiwe yari intungane y’ukuri, bose uko ari babiri bahora bafungura ibifungurwa , rero nurabe ingene tuba menyesha aya majambo y’Imana matagatifu kandi murabe n’ingene bahindurwa
